Name: Disney Infinity 1.0: Gold Edition
About the game: Disney Infinity 1.0: Gold Edition gives you the freedom and endless opportunity to create stories and play experiences with all Disney Infinity 1.0 Characters and Play Sets Unlocked and ready for you to mix, match and mash up to invent just about any adventure you can imagine. All Disney Infinity 1.0 Playsets Unlocked: - The Incredibles - Pirates of the Carribean - Toy Story in Space - Cars - And More... All Disney Infinity 1.0 Characters Unlocked: - Anna & Elsa - Lightning McQueen - Captain Jack Sparrow - Buzz Lightyear - Jack Skellington - Sorcerer's Apprentice Mickey - And More... Enjoy Disney Infinity with a Full Toy Box!
